CQ1.query: List each department's name, building, budget, along with the total credits of all students and total salary of all instructors in that department.
CQ1.sql: SELECT d.dept_name, d.building, d.budget, SUM(s.tot_cred) AS total_student_credits, SUM(i.salary) AS total_instructor_salary FROM department d JOIN student s ON d.dept_name = s.dept_name JOIN instructor i ON d.dept_name = i.dept_name GROUP BY d.dept_name, d.building, d.budget;
